response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled benefits and experiences. Given its unique features and high-quality standards, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth and the value it could bring to you, I am offering this product to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusivity and the potential long-term benefits it offers. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your life or business.", "product_price": 12000}
